title: Infinite Loop. Can get to Fastboot, cant get to Recovery Mode screen.
content:
I am stuck in an infinite loop. Please help!

Got a security upgrade last week on Pixel 3. Got black screen of death. Called carrier support - Got a refurb unit last night through carrier. Got android OTA security update this AM. After complete, hour later, Unit stopped charging, got black screen of death (again) on new refurb.

Now - Can get to bootloader screen only when I plug it into my laptop, not my aftermarket Pixel charger from amazon (weird). If I unplug the phone from laptop, black screen of death. Plug it in? - can get to bootloader.

Would factory reset - but when I click it - I get the blinking text "Google" on my screen as if it is in a bootloop.

And rinse repeat.
